53template <size_t Id, typename PacketType>
54struct PacketInfo {
55 static constexpr size_t NUMBER = Id;
56 using type = PacketType;
57};

69template <typename PACKETS, uint8_t* BASE, FieldFlags FLAGS,
70 size_t MAX_SIZE = 4096>
71class DataFieldPrototype
72 : public FieldPrototype<FieldName::DATA_FIELD, uint8_t*, BASE, FLAGS,
73 MAX_SIZE> {
74 template <typename Fields, typename TCrc>
75 friend class FieldContainer;
76 template <typename Fields, typename TCrc>
77 friend class RxContainer;
78 template <typename Fields, typename TCrc>
79 friend class TxContainer;
80
81 public:
82 static constexpr bool IS_DATA_FIELD{true};
83 using Packets = PACKETS;
84 using FieldType =
85 typename meta::UniqueVariant<PACKETS>::type;
87
93 auto set_id(const int IDENT) -> bool {
94 bool valid = false;
95 std::apply(
96 [&](auto&&... packet) {
97 ((packet.NUMBER == IDENT
98 ? (void)(valid = true,
99 this->template set_size<
100 typename std::decay_t<decltype(packet)>::type>())
101 : (void)0),
102 ...);
103 },
104 Packets{});
105 if (valid) {
106 current_id_ = IDENT;
107 }
108 return valid;
109 }
110
115 [[nodiscard]] auto get_size() const -> size_t override {
116 return packet_size(current_id_);
117 }
118
129 auto get_copy() const -> FieldType { return get_variant_impl<0>(); }
130
134 [[nodiscard]] auto has_id() const noexcept -> bool {
135 return current_id_ >= 0;
136 }
137
141 [[nodiscard]] auto id() const noexcept -> int { return current_id_; }
142
148 template <typename T>
149 auto set_type() -> bool {
150 constexpr int IDENT = get_number<T>();
151 static_assert(IDENT != -1,
152 "SetType<T>(): T is not present in PACKETS mapping");
153 return set_id(IDENT);
154 }
155
156 protected:
158 template <int NAME, std::size_t I = 0>
159 static constexpr auto get_index() -> int {
160 if constexpr (I >= std::tuple_size_v<Packets>) {
161 return -1;
162 } else {
163 using Current = std::tuple_element_t<I, Packets>;
164 if constexpr (NAME == Current::id) {
165 return static_cast<int>(I);
166 } else {
167 return get_index<NAME, I + 1>();
168 }
169 }
170 }
171
173 template <typename T, std::size_t I = 0>
174 static constexpr auto get_number() -> int {
175 if constexpr (I >= std::tuple_size_v<Packets>) {
176 return -1;
177 } else {
178 using Current = std::tuple_element_t<I, Packets>;
179 if constexpr (std::is_same_v<T, typename Current::type>) {
180 return static_cast<int>(Current::NUMBER);
181 } else {
182 return get_number<T, I + 1>();
183 }
184 }
185 }
186
188 void reset() override {
189 current_id_ = -1;
190 this->m_size = 0;
191 }
192
193 private:
194 int current_id_{-1};
195
197 [[nodiscard]] auto packet_size(int IDENT) const -> size_t {
198 auto result = proto::K_ANY_SIZE;
199 auto handle_one = [&](const auto& pkt) {
200 using PktType = typename std::decay_t<decltype(pkt)>::type;
201 if (pkt.NUMBER == IDENT) {
202 if constexpr (std::is_pointer_v<PktType>) {
203 result = this->m_size;
204 } else if constexpr (std::is_same_v<PktType, EmptyDataType>) {
205 result = 0;
206 } else {
207 result = sizeof(PktType);
208 }
209 }
210 };
211 std::apply(
212 [&](const auto&... pkts) {
213 (void)std::initializer_list<int>{(handle_one(pkts), 0)...};
214 },
215 Packets{});
216 return result;
217 }
218
220 template <std::size_t I>
221 auto get_variant_impl() const -> FieldType {
222 if constexpr (I >= std::tuple_size_v<Packets>) {
223 return FieldType{}; // monostate alternative (index 0)
224 } else {
225 using Info = std::tuple_element_t<I, Packets>;
226 using T = typename Info::type;
227 using N = std::remove_cv_t<std::remove_reference_t<T>>;
228 // Alternative index inside FieldType: 1 + position of N in FieldList
229 static constexpr std::size_t ALT =
230 meta::UniqueVariant<PACKETS>::template ALT_INDEX_TRANSFORMED<N>;
231
232 if (current_id_ == static_cast<int>(Info::NUMBER)) {
233 if constexpr (std::is_pointer_v<T>) {
234 using Elem = std::remove_const_t<std::remove_pointer_t<T>>;
235 const auto* raw =
236 reinterpret_cast<const Elem*>(this->BASE + this->m_offset);
237 const std::size_t COUNT = this->get_size() / sizeof(Elem);
238 std::vector<Elem> vec(COUNT);
239 if (COUNT) {
240 std::memcpy(vec.data(), raw, COUNT * sizeof(Elem));
241 }
242 return FieldType{std::in_place_index<ALT>, std::move(vec)};
243 } else {
244 T value{};
245 std::memcpy(&value, this->BASE + this->m_offset, sizeof(T));
246 return FieldType{std::in_place_index<ALT>, value};
247 }
248 }
249 return get_variant_impl<I + 1>();
250 }
251 }
252};
253
255template <typename PACKETS, uint8_t* BASE, FieldFlags FLAGS, size_t MAX_SIZE>
256struct fieldsTuple<DataFieldPrototype<PACKETS, BASE, FLAGS, MAX_SIZE>> {
257 using Type = DataFieldPrototype<PACKETS, BASE, FLAGS, MAX_SIZE>;
258};

261template <typename T, typename = void>
262struct IsDataFieldPrototype : std::false_type {};
263
264template <typename T>
265struct IsDataFieldPrototype<
266 T, std::void_t<decltype(std::remove_cv_t<
267 std::remove_reference_t<T>>::IS_DATA_FIELD)>>
268 : std::true_type {};
